pullRequest.title: Integrate date range selector to search page
pullRequest.bodyText:
#1306
Checklist

Description of change
Integrated the Date range selector with Search page. Also slightly changed to header of Refine panel.

commit.message:
Integrate Date range selector into Search page

Apart from the integration, also fix the issue that date picker did not update
correct field value. And Remove the usage of CardHeader and Divider for
Refine panel.
Add a Jest test for Last modified date selector.

nodes.bodyText: Oh these texts should be language strings.

       <Grid item xs={3}>
         <RefineSearchPanel>
+          <Typography variant="h6">Collections</Typography>

nodes.bodyText:
This is a presentation layer concern, not business logic. Shouldn't be in the Module.
I appreciate it may seem similar to rawMode, however that one impacts what we do with our query to the data layer - whereas this option just controls a cosmetic facade. 🤔
Surely these can just be referred to from searchStrings?

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * A date range for Items' last modified dates.
          
          
            
               * A date range for searching items by last modified date.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * Generate two Date pickers and each of them is wrapped inside a Grid item.
          
          
            
               * Generate two date pickers and wrap them with Grid items.
I think this comment is redundant.

commit.message:
Refactor interface SearchOption

1. Remove field 'dateRangeQuickModeEnabled' from 'SearchOption' because
   this field is not related to a search.
2. Create a subclass of SearchOptions to include 'dateRangeQuickModeEnabled'.
3. Rename variable names and properly use language strings

Fix the conversion between a date range and a Quick date option.

1. When end date is defined but is not equal to today, Quick option 'All'
   should be selected.
2. When the mode is changed, date range may be required to update.
3. When the value of a date picker is undefined, use null instead so it
   does not use today as default value. Also, while a value is defined, do
   not display the label. This is due to the bug of MUI Datepicker.

nodes.bodyText: The change made here is  due a MUI Datepicker UI bug. If people are curious what this bug is, please grab me.

commit.message: Update Search page test for the Date range selector.
Update Search page test to use 'SearchPageOptions'.
